char_info.char_desc: The Oni Happy With Long Hair

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Hey! There's a familiar face! I'm enjoying my new hair. Are you as well?

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Listen to me. I look ridiculous with this hairstyle.

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I think we look very elegant with these new hairstyles.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: How can the people of Gensokyo stand up to me with an absurd appearance like this?

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You don't seem to like it, and whoever started this may find it amusing...

t_scene_info.speaker: Suika:
t_scene_info.dialogue: The tower may be dangerous, so defeat me to prepare yourself.
